title: 服务器怎样禁止核电爆炸或设置爆炸范围？
author: xqxqxxq

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
\config\IC2.ini

; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
reactorExplosionPowerLimit = 1
修改“=”后面的数值即可

replies.author: xqxqxxq
replies.txt_content:
wahaha216 发表于 2016-1-27 12:59
\config\IC2.ini

; Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4.
